channel.title: Why have Keyword Expansion?
channel.description: Every source control system I have worked with until recently supported keyword expansion.  My code comment blocks have always tended to be something like (in Java):-/** * Description. * @author $Author: martin $ * @version $Revision: 12 $ $Date: 2007-01-02...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Victor Bagga+00:00
item.description: We used the keyword $Revision: $ to initialize a variable and provided a mechanism to get the version number of software installed in the field. Without this feature we could not determine if the customer has a correct version or not.
item.dc:creator: Victor Bagga
